amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for state pollution control and prevention grants by $5 million and to reduce funding for the Capitol Improvement and Maintenance fund by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for state pollution control and prevention grants by $5 million. The increase is offset by reducing funding for Capitol Improvement and Maintenance fund by the same amount.
